column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------Â A Chinese man is in a coma
column4: paralysis after a drunken brawl broke out at around 10.20 pm
column8: Phnom Penh.------The victim and suspects have not been identified.------The source said that at first five Chinese people were drinking and began arguing before the fight erupted. The four Chinese nationals were taken to the Sen Sok district police station for interrogation and the victim was rushed to hospital.------Sources said that the nationals were working as construction workers at the scene.------The four Chinese suspects have been formally charged over the incident.------POST NEWS
